Home Projects

Janel Dyan

  • Web,
  • Branding,
  • Print

Janel Dyan is a brand style consultant who helps empower women through clothing. In 2017, Janel Dyan worked with Denim & Steel conduct a comprehensive business and brand refresh. This was a unique opportunity to both improve the client-facing experience as well as deliver a comprehensive visual language for the brand.

I worked with Denim & Steel to design and develop the client-facing web assets and was the visual designer for the brand refresh.

  • Lead Developer: Tylor Sherman
  • UX & Creative Director: Todd Sieling
  • Developer: Andrew Woo

Copyright ©2017, Sean Durfee – Give me a shout!

Colophon: This site was built by myself by hand in HTML and SCSS. Fonts are Freight Sans + Freight Text by Joshua Darden, and are served up with Adobe Typekit. Everything is compiled and served through Jekyll, hosted on Github Pages. Thanks for stopping by!
